content.rendered:
The Embassy of Ukraine in USA and non-profit organization United Help Ukraine invite you to the Annual Charitable Concert by ‘Gerdan’ and Andrew Kraus to commemorate the Heavenly Hundred, who laid down their lives during Ukraine’s Revolution of Dignity of 2013-2014.

Please join us on March 3rd at 6:30 pm (doors open at 6:00 pm) for the concert and reception to follow.

About the artists: Gerdan http://www.gerdan.info/ and Andrew Kraus http://www.andrewkraus.com/

Tickets are $75 per person and are available at https://heavenlyhundred2017.eventbrite.com.
10% Senior/Veteran/Student discount – use code TAKE10.

Funds raised during the concert will be used to benefit wounded Ukrainian soldiers via United Help Ukraine.

Sponsors of the event:

Tyson’s Dental Associates: Tyson’s Dental Associate is a patient driven cosmetic dentistry practice serving Tysons Corner, Vienna, McLean, Fairfax, and all of Virginia. The goal of Tyson’s Dental Associates is to help their patients achieve optimal lifetime oral health through education, prevention and quality treatment. More information is available at http://tysons-dental.com. 

I.S. Law Firm: I.S. Law Firm is a diverse team of professionals representing clients in immigration matters, business developments, and personal injury cases. The law firm’s staff’s competence and experience will ensure the best representation. The firm is conveniently located in Fairfax, Virginia. The lawyers of I.S. Law Firm are licensed to practice law in Virginia, Maryland, New York, and District of Columbia. ” More information is available at http://islawfirm.com.

Alan I. Aldave, Realtor: Alan I. Aldave is a licensed real estate agent with Spring Hill Real Estate, LLC. He provides exceptional service to families seeking to buy, sell, or refinance their homes or investment properties. From closed transactions by Ukrainian Diaspora or their referrals, as well as from referrals received at Ukrainian charitable events, Alan donates the greater of $1,000 or 15% of his real estate commission to the non-profit organization United Help Ukraine, Inc. Alan is licensed in the state of Virginia and his phone number is (703) 863-3329.  More information about Alan is available at: http://alanaldave.xactsite.com.
